title: Bread

properties.name: description
properties.value: A loaf of bread is a type of food that can be obtained by baking bread dough on a cooking range, granting 40 experience when successful. Players may burn the bread while baking one, resulting in burnt bread; the burn rate while baking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 38 on ranges.

Item ID2309

A loaf of bread is a type of food that can be obtained by baking bread dough on a cooking range, granting 40 experience when successful. Players may burn the bread while baking one, resulting in burnt bread; the burn rate while baking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 38 on ranges.

Bread heals 5 hitpoints. It is used in the Below Ice Mountain, Death Plateau, Merlin's Crystal, Olaf's Quest, and Recipe for Disaster quests.

Players can also buy (or steal) bread from the Ardougne Baker's Stall. in the Ardougne marketplace.

[[File:Bread detail.png|left|130px]]
A loaf of '''bread''' is a type of [[food]] that can be obtained by baking [[bread dough]] on a [[cooking range]], granting 40 experience when successful. Players may burn the bread while baking one, resulting in [[burnt bread]]; the [[burn rate]] while baking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 38 on ranges.

Bread heals 5 hitpoints. It is used in the [[Below Ice Mountain]], [[Death Plateau]], [[Merlin's Crystal]], [[Olaf's Quest]], and [[Recipe for Disaster]] quests.

Players can also buy (or steal) bread from the [[Ardougne Baker's Stall.]] in the [[Ardougne]] marketplace.
